skillsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: Whenever an attack of this Monster gets resisted, gain Might and apply Armor Break on the enemy.
4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to itself
When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Might (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Attack value.
3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Applies Might (Buff) to whole party
Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)
Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)
Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)
Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)
6 x 100% (600%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself
Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to a random Monster.
Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to two random Monsters.
Applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to whole party
Applies Might, Sorcery & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party
Before an action, there is 10% chance for every 100 Max Mana to gain Might and Sorcery. This monster can receive one additional stack of Might and Sorcery.
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party
Aura: Might (Buff) and Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked one additional time. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.
Applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.
Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party
Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to a random Monster.
Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to two random Monsters.
Applies Glory & Might (Buffs) to whole party
Aura: Aquatic and Warrior Monsters in the party start with Might, Glory, or Regeneration. They can gain an additional stack of those Buffs.
Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Spellshield (Buff) to a random Monster.
